subject: Baseball
Ankles (Body Part)
Boston Marathon Bombings (2013)
lead_paragraph: Derek Jeter has done less in the field in recent days than he had done the previous week simply to keep added stress off his surgically repaired left ankle, Manager Joe Girardi said.
snippet: Derek Jeter has done less in the field in recent days than he had done the previous week simply to keep added stress off his surgically repaired left ankle, Manager Joe Girardi said.
